WorkItem.Description: The "Crushless mob" debuff, found in Rawr.Bear is not properly working. In my opinion it should decrease crush chance by 15% and increase hit by 15% for the mob. Same thing should happen with "Sunwell radiance", as I understand mobs and bosses in Sunwell can't crush.

Comments.Message: These two buffs are working correctly. They're just not updating on the Combat Table chart, which is what I'm guessing you're looking at. I've fixed that for the next version. In the mean time, just pretend the Combat Table looks right; Rawr is using the correct calculations for ratings.
